summary: Build a simple link-in-bio single-page site featuring social links, a booking button, and a newsletter signup.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Soft abstract gradient background with subtle grain (linkbio-bg.dim_1600x900.png)
- Minimal circular avatar illustration placeholder (avatar-placeholder.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page link-in-bio layout that presents: (1) a profile header (name, short tagline, optional avatar), (2) a list of social link buttons, (3) a primary “Booking” button, and (4) a newsletter signup section with an email field and submit button.

Add a simple, developer-editable configuration for the page content (profile name/tagline, social links list, booking URL, and optional footer text) that can be changed without touching multiple components.

Implement newsletter signup submission with basic client-side validation (required field + email format). Show clear success and error states inline (e.g., “Thanks for subscribing” or a validation message).
Add a creative, coherent visual theme for the link-in-bio page (colors, typography, spacing, button styles) and apply it consistently across all sections. Avoid a blue/purple default palette.
Use generated static images for a subtle page background and a default avatar, and render them from frontend static assets (do not fetch via backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a simple link-in-bio page with social links, a booking button, and a newsletter signup.

Create backend storage for newsletter subscribers in the single Motoko actor, with an update method to add a subscriber email. Prevent obvious duplicates (case-insensitive compare) and store a created-at timestamp for each subscription.
